1131.content:
Deciding that it'd probably be fun to be a baby for a while and have the rest of the family do everything for you while you got to sit back and relax (taking particular pleasure in the thought of Jessica having to look after you, knowing how much that would annoy her) you jump out of your bed and pull the age ray out of your desk drawer, taking another quick look over the instructions to make sure that you don't accidentlly press the wrong button and end up as an old man or something, you twiddle the knobs on the side till it reads; "(-14 YEARS) REALITY CHANGE". Being currently 14 years old and 5 months, you figure that will give you enough leeway to de-age into a baby without becoming a fetus (which is quite a creepy thought) or worse, and doing a last double check of everything, not entirely sure what will happen, you point the ray at yourself and fire.

Moments after seeing a flash of bright blue light, your vision returns, slightly blurred and you feel a strange sort of tingling all over your body, not unpleasant, but definitely weird. "Holy crap, did it work?" you say to yourself, your voice not seeming any different, holding out your hand in front of your eyes to see if anything has changed. It takes a few seconds for the blurriness to disappear and you can clearly make out your hand which pretty much looks exactly the same as it did a minute ago (certainly nothing like a baby's). "What gives? It worked on the bird," you think as you put down the ray and return to the instructions on your desk, wondering if you did indeed do something wrong. It is just then however that you suddenly start to feel something weird happening, the tingling sensation becoming much more intense as the room begins to get bigger around you and it doesn't take long for you to discover that it's not the room that is growing, it is you that is shrinking (the ray seemed to have a slight delayed reaction) as you gaze at your now small, chubby looking hands that seem to be getting increasingly smaller. "Oh wow, this is cool!" you exclaim as you continue shrinking, looking down over the rest of your body and discovering that the t-shirt and shorts you had worn to bed were shrinking with you, changing before your very eyes, becoming a light blue color and seeming to fuse together, covering your now tiny legs and feet, transforming into a baby's romper suit.

So amazed with what is happening to you, you barely even notice the rest of the room; the entire contents of which had transformed from that of a 14 year old's into that of a infant's. Gone was your bed, replaced by a large cot, your TV, Xbox and comic books vanishing and becoming a collection of teddy bears and wooden blocks and other childs playthings, even the walls, once covered by posters of movies, video games and cartoons you liked had changed and was now a light blue color with fluffy white clouds and bright yellow stars running along the edges. The whole experience was surreal and very freaky but also hugely exciting as reality itself changed around you.

"That was amazing!" you exclaimed once it had stopped, or at least tried to, unfortunately all that escaped from your lips was a gurgling sound, the ability to speak seeming to have left you as you sat in the middle of your strange new giant bedroom, amongst some brightly colored blocks, the age ray now lying at your small feet. Taking a moment or two to assess your new surroundings, vaguely recognizing it from photos you'd seen of yourself as a baby, you realized that the reality setting had not only changed you but everything to do with you as well. "Whoever invented this thing is a genius!" you told yourself, reaching out with your hands to try and pick up the ray, before discovering that with your short arms it's too far away to reach, "Heh, guess this will take some getting used to." You then try and stand up off the ground, getting half way there before suddenly stumbling backwards and landing on your ass, your baby legs unable to hold you up, seemingly having had yet to master the ability to walk. "Well this is going to be interesting," you tell yourself as you flop about on the ground," Not only am I not going to be expected to do anything, I can't actually do anything either!"

That's when the bedroom door suddenly creaks open and you see a figure walk in.

1212121111.content:
"Sorry sweety, but a girl's image is above all else" Melissa answered, throwing the one piece at John as she whisked away to the changing room. John dropped the swimsuit, chasing after his mother in hopes of reasoning with her. But alas, Melissa had already chosen a room to change in, leaving her son waiting on the other side of the curtain.
"Melissa.... please reconsider" John pleads to his mother, but the rejuvenated teen girl ignored her anxious son for she was too busy observing herself in the mirror. John repeated his plea one more time, and this time he got an reply - just not the one he was expecting.

"Hey John... could you come in here" Melissa whispered through the curtain.

"Whaaa!!! But Mo-- I mean Melissa, someone's going to see me and think I'm peeping" John insisted

His mother seemed ever so insistent. "Oh come on dear, just sneak in when no one's looking. I mean you sure had no problem sneaking into the theater"

John struggled to come up with a good excuse, instead simply asking "Bu.. why anyway?"

"Because, girl likes me would appreciate a boy's opinion on how she looks" Melissa adorably answered her anxious son. Knowing that his mom wasn't gonna take no for an answer, John let out a deep breath before looking around. No one seemed to be looking; everyone was either focused elsewhere or still in the other changing rooms. So John, as quick as he could while remaining quiet, entered the other side of the curtain. After making sure the curtain was fully closed, he looked behind him where he was met with a sight that left him speechless.

"So, what do you think?" Melissa asked her son, posing adorably in the red two piece, which John had to admit fit her figure perfectly. It was no surprise therefore that his cheeks were blushing almost as red as the swimsuit.

Struggling to come up with the words to say, he simply whispered, "well... it's ok I guess... I mean I can see why you really wanted to wear a 2-piece - just about any girl from my grade would likely be jealous if they saw you..."

Satisfied with her son's input, Melissa stepped closer to John, giving him a little hug. This got John a little excited, even if it was a light hug from his mother - granted a cute teenage version of his mother. Melissa took notice, stepping away, which made John panic.

"No wait, I - I'm sorry, it's just -" John tried to explain, though before he could finish the sentence, Melissa shrugged it off

1223.content:
"Hey honey, what you doing hovering around out there?" your mom says with a curious smile, presumably wondering why you were standing there watching her doing laundry.

"Oh uh, nuh-nothing mom," you stutter nervously, feeling a little embarrassed at being caught, quickly hiding the age ray behind your back before your mother could see it, "Just uh, just wondering whats for breakfast that's all."

"Well I can do you pancakes, or french toast again if you really like," she answers with a slight giggle as she closes the dryer, obviously finding your strange behavior to be quite humorous.

"Yah french toast would be cool thanks mom," you said, shifting your body slightly as you noticed your mom's eyes peering curiously to see what you were hiding.

"What have you got there John?" she then asked, causing you to gulp, not really wanting to reveal your cool new toy just yet, having barely had any time to see if it worked.

"Nothing," you said with a shrug, scratching your nose with one hand, hoping that would convince her. Your mom however was far too perceptive for that and started walking towards you with a playful grin, all to aware that you weren't being entirely honest with her.

"Oh come on John, don't give me that," she laughed as you backed away slightly, "what are you hiding?"

You wondered what you should do as she got closer towards you, figuring that you didn't really have many options, acting way to suspicious to keep the pretense up. You could always come clean and show her, your mom was pretty cool and maybe she would get a kick out of it, maybe you could use it together, have some fun. Of course she then might wonder why you were spying on her with it, and realize you were going to use it on her without her permission which might be kind of embarrassing and awkward. The other option was of course just to run back upstairs and hide it in your room and hope she forgets about it, but that seemed sort of unlikely; either way you had to do something fast as she was right on top of you now, a mischievous little grin on her face.

"Come on John, fess up," she laughed, "Don't make me tickle it out of you!"
1223.title: She sees you

choices: You tell her and she lets you use the ray on her
You tell her and she decides to use the ray on you as payback
12231.content:
"Okay okay!" you laugh uncontrollably as your mother's probing fingers start tickling under your arms causing you to squirm all over the place practically dropping the ray, "I'll show you, I'll show you!" It wasn't the ideal solution, but being tickled by your mom was your kryptonite and she always knew how to best exploit your weakness, and besides you figured as she was in a cheery mood maybe she wouldn't mind so much about you having it.

"Alright mister, time to come clean," she said gazing down at the ray gun in your hand, a curious little smile appearing across her face, "What on earth is that?"

Looking down at it yourself, knowing that if you hadn't have read the instructions either you'd have absolutely no idea what the heck it was just like your mother, the weird design being unlike anything you've ever seen before and you wondered for a moment whether you could pass it off as just a kids toy and keep it's true purpose hidden, before deciding even that seemed somewhat implausible, the various nobs and dials being far too sophisticated and that it was best just to tell her the truth. "It's uhm...well it's an age ray," you said scratching your head, pretty sure she wouldn't believe the real explanation either.

"An age ray?" she replied, looking a little bemused, "What's an age ray when it's at home?"

"You know, it's kind of like a ray that changes people's ages. It's like scientific and stuff...I think." The look on her face as you said this didn't seem to change in the slightest, indicating that she still wasn't buying it, and you realized you had better tell her the whole story, starting from where you found it. "There was this crashed van yesterday, on the way home from school, the doors were open and this thing was inside, there's instructions and everything."

"Wait a minute, you took this from somebody's van?" she asked, her cheery tone suddenly becoming much more serious.

"Well it was crashed and all the windows were broken, and the company logo was all scratched off, I didn't know who it belonged to," you quickly explained, trying to cover up the fact that you had blatantly stolen it. "And-and besides, anyone could have taken it," you added in a last ditch effort to validate your actions, "Little kids or something...I figured it would be safer with me."

Your mom thought on this for a moment, her face almost impossible to read as she held out her hand and gestured for you to pass her the ray, which you gingerly did. Examining it for a couple of minutes, her fingers lightly tracing the various nobs and buttons, she then looked back up at you again and said, "Hm, let me see the instructions."

Leading her upstairs and into your bedroom, you pulled the instructions out of your desk drawer and gave them to her, letting her flick through them while you stood there watching, nervously awaiting her final reaction and waiting to see if she was going to take it off you or even ground you for taking it. "This has got to be a joke or something surely..." she finally said, still pouring over the pages of text, a similar disbelief to your first reaction on seeing the ray very apparent in her voice.

"No it's real, it works!" you assured her, remembering the bird from the day before, moving closer towards her and pointing at the ray gun still in her hand. "It's got all these different settings and I tested it out on a bird yesterday and it got really small like it had gotten younger once I zapped it."

"But who would invent something like this and why? It just seems so impossible."

"I dunno mom, but it's definitely real, I promise you that."

She stared at the instructions again for a few more minutes, then slowly placed them back onto the desk, holding the ray in both hands and shaking her head slightly as she stared at it, obviously wondering what to do with such a piece of equipment and you nervously hoped that she would let you keep it (or at least keep it herself and not give it away to any shady government organizations like you had seen on the TV or anything). "So it really works?" she asked, looking up at your face again.

"Yeah it really does!" you told her, hoping it would finally sink in.

"Then do you mind telling me what you were doing with it hidden behind your back while watching me do the laundry, hm?"
12231.title: The truth

122311.content:
"Well I uh...." you mumble awkwardly, realizing you've been caught out, trying to think of a good excuse but unable to come up with any, "I was eh, I was just going to test it out y'know, on a person..."

From the look on your mother's face you were well aware that she already knew what your intentions were as she crossed her arms and scowled slightly at you (with just a hint of a smile peeking through). "Oh were you now? And what exactly were you planning on doing to me then while I was completely unaware?" she asked, raising an eyebrow, after glancing down at the settings on the ray, presumably noticing that it still had the "Mental Change" command displayed.

"Heh, well I was just curious to see what you were like when you were younger that's all," you said, laughing nervously, before quickly adding, "But I was gonna change you back again straight away!"

"Oh I bet you were," she said with a chuckle, seeing right through you, before taking a more serious tone, "But you know you really shouldn't have taken this thing without telling anyone, and you especially shouldn't be messing around with it on someone else without them knowing; who knows what might happen?"

She did have you there, you really had no idea what the side effects of the ray would be on her, you were just so excited to try it out you never really bothered to think. "Sorry mom," you replied meekly, feeling a little ashamed and embarrassed for trying to deceive her like that (especially considering how cool she was being about the whole thing).

"So," she then said, her eyes fixed firmly on the ray she was curiously examining in her hands once again, "Exactly what age were you planning on making me think I was then?"

"I'm not really sure to be honest, I was thinking like somewhere between 14 and 21, see if you were as cool as you are now back when you were my age."

"Ha, flattery will get you nowhere mister," she laughed, the serious moment seemingly having passed. It was quite obvious that she was becoming curious herself about the possibilities of such a device existing and the fact that she was still discussing it with you rather than having confiscated it straight away filled you with some hope that perhaps you would get to use after all. "And you know how it all works then do you?"

"Yeah I read the instructions like 20 times last night, it's really quite simple really," you told her, your enthusiasm for the device becoming pretty apparent.

"And it's perfectly safe, nothing can go wrong?"

"As far as I know," you said, not entirely sure yourself (after all, your only experience with it so far having been on a bird) but figuring it must be, "Besides everything is reversible, all it takes is a few turns of a dial."

Your mom mused on this for a moment, rubbing at her chin with her hand, occasionally glancing back over at the instructions then back to the ray as if considering whether she should use it or not, before looking back up at you with a mischievous little smile and saying, "Alright John, while I'm still not happy you kept this thing to yourself without telling me, I don't see any harm on testing it out. Plus being younger for a little while would certainly not do any harm."

"Wow, really mom, you mean it?" you beamed, rather excitedly, "You really wanna test it out?"

"Well until your father and sister get home," she said, giving you at least until Sunday night, possibly Monday, depending on when they returned (which should be plenty of time to have some fun). "And I don't think changing my mental state like you were planning would be such a good idea," she continued rather sternly, causing you to feel slightly guilty for even considering such a thing, "But maybe giving me a more youthful body would be fun. Then I'd have more energy to chase after you and keep you from all these crazy schemes of yours." You both chuckled slightly at this and she handed you back the age ray, much to your delight, worried for a moment that you were just going to be relegated to explaining how it worked while she used it on herself (though your mom did still have trouble using the DVD player from time to time so really there was no question of that happening).

"Sweet!" you said under your breath, gazing down at the ray and fiddling with the settings to change it from Mental to Normal.

"Now no funny business okay sweetheart?" she smiled, wiggling her fingers in front of your face, "These fingers can still tickle you no matter what age I am."

"Heh, sure mom, no problem," you laughed, before returning back to the settings of the ray, "Now what age do you want me to make you?"

1223111.content:
"Well seeing as you were so keen to see what I was like at your age, why don't you just go ahead and make me 14?" your mother smiled, giving you a little wink, "that way I can forget about all the washing and laundry for a while and we can have some quality mom and son time."

"Okay 14 it is then," you said, turning the dial so the display read "(-22 YEARS) NORMAL CHANGE", thinking for a moment about how weird it would be to be hanging around with your mom for the day (the mental change having at least made her mentally the same age as you instead of a 36 year old in a teenagers body) but you figure as she was pretty cool and fun to be around the rest of the time, hopefully it would be okay. "You ready?" you then asked, pointing the ray at her and watching her take a deep breath to compose herself.

"As ready as I'll ever be," she replied, closing her eyes tightly and awaiting the transformation.

"Here goes nothing then," you said, squeezing the trigger and watching as a flash of purple light shot out and struck your mother square on the chest, seemingly bouncing off and filling them room for a moment before disappearing. Opening one eyes and gazing around nervously, your mom looked up at you and asked, "Is it over?" before looking down at herself and realizing that it hadn't even started yet.

"Oh, did you do something wrong?" she said, opening both eyes now and patting her self down, looking both a little disappointed and a little relieved at the same time. You were about to answer that you didn't think so, before remembering that even on the bird it had taken a couple of moments to work and sure enough watched as her eyes suddenly went wide and she looked down at herself in amazement as her robe began to loosen around her body and she began to get smaller, the few lines and wrinkles on her face vanishing and giving her a much more youthful complexion. "Oh my God it's working!" she squealed, practically jumping up and down with excitement and you yourself were somewhat amazed, watching as your 36 year old mother regressed to 14 years old right in front of your very eyes.

"Holy crap that was cool!" you exclaimed once the process had seemingly stopped and your mom stood in front of you, her pink satiny robe hanging off her now that she'd lost at least 4 inches in height and a considerable amount of her body weight (not that she had been fat by any means, but she was now much slimmer and less curvy). Her face was both instantly recognizable as your mother and also not; young and vibrant and admittedly incredible cute, while her large bust had also lost a few cup sizes but was still quite impressive for a 14 year old girl's. While you ran your eyes over your mothers new youthful figure, she was doing exactly the same, her face lit up with wonder, her hands patting at her face and body, spinning around in a whirlwind of excitement.

"This is unbelievable!" she yelped, her voice also sounding much younger as she ran over to you, gripping you tightly by the arms and grinning like a mad woman, "I'm 14! I'm actually 14!"

"You sure are," you laughed, your mom's enthusiasm becoming infectious, still reeling from the fact that your beautiful mother as a teenage girl was way hotter than you could ever have imagined. She of course always told you that she was only beautiful when she was younger, which you had always scoffed at, knowing how pretty she was now, but seeing her like this you were totally blown away, finally realizing why she had said that.

"Well, what do I look like?" she asked, still holding onto your arms, shaking them back and forward slightly. "No wait, don't tell me! I need a mirror!" And with that she skipped out of the room, her robe trailing at her feet as she did, heading for the bathroom to check out her new reflection. You stood there alone for a moment, staring down at the age ray, thinking about how cool this was, before hearing a loud scream of joy and placing it back onto your desk you ran after your excited mother.

"Morning sweetheart, how'd you fancy pancakes for breakfast?" she asks, turning round and flashing you a smile.

Your mom paused for a moment before answering as if trying to remember, before saying, "Uhm, I think he either said he was going to do some work in his study or he was heading to the gym. I forget which now, but you know your father, if it's not one it's the other." She was certainly right about that, work and exercising being his two greatest passions, locking himself in his private office for hours on end every weekend to "get ahead of the competitors" as he called it, and pretty much the rest of the time working out, having frequently dragged you along for one of his runs which always turned out to be more like work than fun, the two things being pretty much the same for him.

"He just needs to get some exercise equipment in there and he'll never come out," you joked as your mom placed your breakfast down in front of you, causing her to laugh before you got tucked in.

After devouring the food and talking with your mom (making up some phony baloney reason as to why you were looking for your dad) you headed towards his private study hoping to find him there so you could execute your little plan; now very excited at the prospect of having your dad as an equal rather than the all powerful ruler of the household. "What is it?" you heard his voice from behind the door say after you had finished knocking, happy that he was indeed in and that you didn't have to wait for him to return from the gym.

"It's just me dad," you replied, still hovering outside, knowing that he didn't like anyone just barging in and disturbing him while he was busy with work, "Can I come in?"

Inside the immaculately neat and well organized study you found your father sitting behind a large oak desk, pouring over some files, wearing his funny little reading glasses (which you always knew meant he was in serious business mode), his eyes not even lifting from the papers he was holding as you walked in. You stood silently in the doorway for a few seconds, gazing around the room, never really being allowed inside all that often and curious what changes he'd made since your last visit. The walls were all wood paneled with various family portraits and the occasional photo of him fishing or sailing with his work colleagues adorning them, three large filing cabinets taking up one side, while his desk took up the other. It was certainly a far cry from the mess and disorganization of your own room.

"Yes Matt...What is it?" he said, finally looking up at you, obviously getting impatient at the reason for your interruption. The ultra serious scowl he now wore on his face made you slightly nervous about what you were going to do, half expecting to get in trouble just for the thought of it it, but realizing that was why you had decided to use the ray on your dad in the first place, so you could see a more relaxed and carefree version of him, someone that was actually fun to hang around with for a change. 14231.content:
You'd never had the chance to have a little sister. With Jessica two years older than you, you'd always been the youngest in the household, always the baby. Well, that was about to change. With her age cut in half, Jessica would be only eight - this was your chance to meet the little sister you'd never had.
Flipping the dials on the remote to the correct settings, you slip out of your room and head down the corridor, where you knock confidently on your sister's door. There's a moment's delay, then she opens it.
"What?" she asks, scowling, "I was listening to music, what do you want?"
Without pausing to answer, you point the remote at her midsection and fire. The purple laser jumps again from the ray, and suddenly everything around you seems to shift. The music emanating from her room turns to kid-friendly pop; the posters on her wall turn from rock bands to Barbie; most drastic of all, you have to shift your gaze downwards to meet the eyes of your now-eight year old sister.

She's still obviously your sister - her face is still the same shape, her hair still dark and straight, eyes still deep brown - but the transformation from moody, wannabe-adult teenager to eight year old kid is massive. You blink down at your little sister, and she looks back at you; just now instead of a bitchy scowl on her face, she simply looks curious.
"Ah-uh, sorry, I didn't hear you. What did you say?" you ask, trying not to stare. She looks so different! At sixteen, your sister had been slim and sexual, dressing in revealing clothes that shamelessly showed off her generous rear and pert chest - to your mom's regular dismay. Now at eight she's chubby and innocent, dressed in a cute pink dress with little hearts around the collar. This remote was powerful! Almost too powerful - especially as you don't really understand how it works. You'd just warped reality to make it so that you have a little sister - how did the ray decide how reality changed to accomodate that? Did it choose randomly? When you de-aged your sister with the reality warp setting, was that simply reversing her back to how she'd actually been when she was eight, or was it creating a whole new universe and history leading up to this point to make sure you have a sister of the right age? And- and if you age her up again now, would she be the exact same as she had been - or had you deleted that exact sister entirely by using the reality warp function? So many questions!
"I was just asking what you wanted," she says, interrupting your musings with a nonplussed shrug, "You knocked and now you're just standing there looking at me weirdly."
14231.title: Your little sister

142331.content:
You decide to make your sister two years old, so you pick up the age ray and seek her out. You eventually discover her in her room. You knock on the door, and she opens the door. Before she can say anything, you fire the gun. A blue and green light covers her or a bit, and once it has faded, your sixteen-year-old sister is no more. In her place is just a little girl you don't recognize since you were too young to remember her the last time she was this age.

         Her brown hair was now tied up in a green pigtails. She wore a bright yellow sundress, one that only barely covered the white disposable diaper she wore underneath. Her feet were completely bare, probably since she hadn't been wearing any when she opened the door.

         Jessica took one look at her now toddler's body and started to cry. It is clear that she remembers being sixteen and is upset that she is now two.

         "No!" she whined. "I don't want to be wittle again. Turn me back."

         "Nuh-uh," you said. "I like you better this way. You're just so adorable, and you're too young and cute to be mean to me anymore."

         You lift Jessica into your arms and carry her into her room, which has completely transformed. There is a lot more pink than you remembered, and in place of her bed is a pearl-white crib. You set her down in front of some baby toys.

         "There you go," you said. "Now you can have fun again without any of those pesky teenage problems."

         What happens now?
